alert.note: Alert for Calumet; Winnebago (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:03PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Calumet and southeastern Winnebago Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 202 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oshkosh, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oshkosh, Central Lake Winnebago, Brothertown, Brant, Quinney, Eaa, Jericho, Wittman Field, Ford Festival Grounds and Black Wolf Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
